sentence.Network_en: Undemocratically, he made all the important decisions without his colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不与同事商量就做了所有的重大决策,这是很不民主的.

list.abs: 不落俗套 be unconventional不民主现象 undemocratic practices憋着一肚子气 harbor pent-up grievances
the union broke with its past undemocratic procedures ., 联邦废除了以往不民主的做法.

on Saturday night , after a hard fought presidential campaign and a whisker-thin loss at the ballot box , the KMT coalition lashed out in a decidedly undemocratic way .星期六晚上，历经苦战却以毫微之差落败，国民党联盟以极度反民主的方式反扑。
on the other hand , overly intrusive judicial review is sometimes criticized for its undemocratic character .另一方面，过分侵略性的司法审查有时又因不民主的特质而受到批评。

sentences.sentence: "undemocratically, he made all the important decisions without his colleagues"
